rukus.text: Nabiyow! ixxic: Yallak wacyi yol obsimeech diggah jinnik horta yakke mari qhuraan yok ankaciseeh, yoo nummayseh, tokkel usun sinni marâ fanah gacen waqdi: nanu diggah qajiibik (cakkumuk) yan qhuraan noobbeeh ankacisne keenik iyyen
Tama Qhuraan cakkii kee maqaanê fanah seecaah, meqe gita sinaamah yascasse, tokkel nanu kaa nummasneeh, ninni Rabbit agleh hebeltohim mahaynaay kaah abna qibaadat tu ma nasgalla
Kaadu diggah ni Rabbih nabna fayya itteeh, usuk barra ma haysitinnaay, xalay ma haysitinna iyyen
Kaadu ni toogimayti (ibliis kinnuk) Yallak cakki gitak xeeruk raqta maxco axcuk suge, yalli barraa kee baxa le iyye waqdi
Kaadu diggah, nanu seehadaa kee jinni Yallal dirab heewaytam nekkele
Kaadu diggah seehadak labha jinnik labha magansitak teneeh, jinni conxóo kee caddoktatur keenih osisak yen
Diggah, seehadâ koros tekkeleh isin kah tekkelen innah jinnow Yalli rabteemik num ugse weelem
Kaadu jinni: diggah nanu qaran gufnam fanneeh, gibdi malaykay kaa dacrissaa kee dabiitittek kibbiimeh neh suge iyye
Kaadu diggah, nanu ahak duma qaraanak elle daffeyna arooca luk sugne kay xaagu ankacisnuh, tokkel taway too xaagu ankacisam faxa num dabiitay kaa qambaala geele
Diggah, nanu (jinni butta kinnuk) Yalli baaxol yan marah faxem umaané kinnim kee hinnay ken Rabbi keenih faxem maqaané kinnim manaaxiga
Kaadu diggah meqe maray Yallak meesita net yaniih, wohuk kalah yan mari net yanih butta buttay sissinih anuk
Kaadu jinni iyyeh; diggah nanu Yalla baaxô bagul taanise waynaah kudimil kaak assaqqee waynam nismiteh nee digaalam faxek

Kaadu diggah, nanu qhuraanay massa le gitâ fanah tirri sinam haa noobbe waqdi kaa nummasneh tokkel isi Rabbi nummayse num abite maqaaneh daggoysiyyak ma meesitaay dulmih abe umaanek fulah tu kaat osisaanamak mameesita
Kaadu diggah;nanu garab muslimiinih kak yaniih, garab korosuh kak yan mara kinnino, Tokkel yuslume marah tu gactek, too mari meqe gita doorite mara
Kaadu koroosite marah tu gactek, jahannam giráh bocó yakken
Kaadu Yalli: insii kee jinni islaamaninnô gita yibbixeenih diggi elle axcinnoonuy maggo leek ken afaquk nen iyye
Wohul ken naqiyyirê gidah, isi Rabbih kassitit (Qhuraan kinnuk) derre cabe num, Yalli gibdi digaalá kaa culsa
Kaadu diggah, masaagid Yallih iimik kay addal kaak kalihim maqbudinaay qibaad kaah caglisa
Kaadu diggah, Yallih naqsi Nabii Mucammad fraseo isi Rabbi yaqbuduh soole waqdi jinni kay amol sittak bagul sitta qoxxisam akke raarra hee Qhuraan kaak ankacisuh
